Subskills.name: Screech
Subskills.description: Parrots now send a traveling screeching wave on attack knocking monsters back dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Flock Gathering
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of parrots.

Subskills.name: GM Crops
Subskills.description: Increases the life and damage dealt by parrots.

Subskills.name: Target Practise
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by parrots against bosses.

Subskills.name: Pirate's Best Friend
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to reduce target's damage dealt.

Subskills.name: Pecking Order
Subskills.description: Parrots now unleash a frozen nova every five attacks with increased radius and damage.

Subskills.name: Upper Wing
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Beak of Steel
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by parrot.

Subskills.name: Killing Command
Subskills.description: Parrots have a chance on hit to enrage, significantly increasing their attack speed and damage for a short duration before dying.

Subskills.name: Pecking Pack
Subskills.description: Summon all parrots with one cast empowering the parrots with increased attack speed. Parrot now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Captain's Parrot
Subskills.description: Now only summon one big parrot scaling with the amount of total parrots attacking with increased radius and damage.
